Novos: New Name, Same Great Deal (2GB in Belgium from €8/mo + more!)

Antwerp, minikvm, Novos January 21, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

A while back, we featured a company called MiniKVM.  Later they rebranded as MaxiKVM.  Martijn (who you may know as @marvel on our sister site, LowEndTalk), recently contacted us with a new offer from the rebranded company: Novos.

Some might be nervous about a company switching names (though it does happen even among the biggest).  However, Novos is registered in Belgium and now has their own facilities.

And of course, any host that proudly says on their About page that they are active on LowEndTalk warms my heart ♥️.

  • They’re offering 2GB on Ryzen gear for  €8/mo or €80/year!
  • SATA storage is upgradable during order for only €6/mo for each additional TB or €5/mo with annual payment!

If you’re interested, you should first review their Terms of Service.  You can pay with Credit Card (Stripe), Bancontact, iDEAL, SOFORT, Giropay, Bitcoin (Bitpay), Paypal, Przelewy24 and Alipay.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“We offer VPS servers from Antwerp, Belgium which is a rare location in this market. We are right in the middle of London, Amsterdam, Paris and Frankfurt with great connections to either one of those locations.  Our entire network, hardware and storage is redundant. Our goal is to provide stable, high performant VPS services with maximum availability.”

You can read reviews on TrustPilot.
